title: Reid Hoffman: The Master of Scale
description: Founder of LinkedIn Reid Hoffman joins us today to talk all about scaling businesses quickly and effectively. Through his experience scaling PayPal and LinkedIn and investing in companies like Airbnb, Reid has formulated a bulletproof scaling strategy. Today, we dive into unexpected lessons in scaling, monopolizing the market, and the importance of network effects. Reid draws on concrete examples from leaders of the most successfully scaled companies who have made appearances on his podcast, Masters of Scale.
itunes:title: Reid Hoffman: The Master of Scale
itunes:author: Morning Brew
itunes:subtitle: Founder of LinkedIn Reid Hoffman joins us today to talk all about his success with hyper-scaling businesses through the magic of what he calls “blitzscaling.”
